DOC.brief_title: A Single Centre Study Analyze Cataract Surgery Following Femtosecond Laser-Assisted Manual Cataract Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: A detailed pre-operative examination ensure every interested willing patient fulfills inclusion criterion study . For proposed contralateral eye study 30 35 patient enrol whereas one eye randomize undergo manual cataract surgery one laser assist cataract surgery . In total 60 70 eye include study . Pre-operative examination include confirm clinical practice . Examinations day surgery occurrence procedure also list . Post-operative examination , document occurrence , outcome possible difference treatment technique , carry 1 day , 1 week , 1 month , 3 month 6 month . After 6 month final report include study result produce .
